SEARCH
Package model

Class DataManager

java.lang.Object
model.DataManager
public class DataManager extends Object
This class interfaces between the internal model and the UI controllers.

    • readUsers

      public void readUsers()
      Reads the users from the users file and adds them to the users ArrayList.
      Parameters:
      users - The ArrayList to add the users to.
      Throws:
      IOException - If the file cannot be read.
      ClassNotFoundException - If the file cannot be deserialized.
      See Also:
      • ObjectInputStream
      • FileInputStream
      • File

    • writeUsers

      public void writeUsers()
      Writes the users to the db/users file.
      Parameters:
      users - The ArrayList containing the users to write.
      See Also:
      • ObjectOutputStream
      • FileOutputStream
      • File
